answer:
Contact your local health unit in Kelowna, using our health unit finder. Tell the health unit your partner has never been vaccinated and would like to start now. Read about vaccines recommended for adults who have never been vaccinated here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Contact your local health unit in Kelowna, using our health unit finder.

Tell the health unit your partner has never been vaccinated and would like to start now.

## Read about vaccines recommended for adults who have never been vaccinated here.

Immunization Nurse
question: Hello, my partner is 51 years old and was never vaccinated as a child. We would like to know where to go/call in Kelowna to get his vaccines up to date.
question_variation_0: where are vaccines up to date
question_variation_1: where to get vaccines up to date
question_variation_2: where to get your partner vaccinated
